outline:
1. to pluck up, root up
    1. (Qal) to pluck up, root up
    2. (Niphal) to be plucked up
  2. to cut, hamstring
    1. (Piel) to cut, hamstring
kjv_def: dig down, hough, pluck up, root up.
strongs_def: to pluck up (especially by the roots); specifically, to hamstring; figuratively, to exterminate
